pageTitle: Real Estate Market Trends for Signal Hill, CA - Trulia
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {2352=The median sales price for homes in Signal Hill CA for Apr 15 to Jul 15 was $340,000. This represents a decline of 5.6%, or $20,000, compared to the prior quarter and a decrease of 12.4% compared to the prior year. Sales prices have appreciated 0.3% over the last 5 years in Signal Hill. The average listing price for Signal Hill homes for sale on Trulia was $459,513 for the week ending Jul 22, which represents an increase of 2.3%, or $10,491, compared to the prior week and an increase of 1.6%, or $7,045, compared to the week ending Jul 01. Average price per square foot for Signal Hill CA was $285, an increase of 4% compared to the same period last year.}

textAfterTable: Want to know more about in Signal Hill? Ask local experts Summary for Signal Hill The median sales price for homes in Signal Hill CA for Apr 15 to Jul 15 was $340,000. This represents a decline of 5.6%, or $20,000, compared to the prior quarter and a decrease of 12.4% compared to the prior year. Sales prices have appreciated 0.3% over the last 5 years in Signal Hill. The average listing price for Signal Hill homes for sale on Trulia was $459,513 for the week ending Jul 22, which represents an increase of 2.3%, or $10,491, compared to the prior week and an increase of 1.6%, or $7,045, compared to the week ending Jul 01.
